CustomField.formula: IF( AND( TODAY() < (Vaccine_Due_Distemper__c ), TODAY() < (Vaccine_Due_Hepatitis__c ), TODAY() < (Vaccine_Due_Parainfluenza__c), TODAY() < (Vaccine_Due_Parvovirus__c ), TODAY() < (Physical_Exam_Latest__c ), TODAY() < (Vaccine_Due_Rabies__c ) ), 'Good', 'Expired' & IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif", '*') )
CustomField.label: Vaccination Expiry Date Status
